short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you an easy way to flip through a bookmarks folder of comics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read lots of web comics? Then this app is for you! Easily flip between the comics that you love by the tap of the button. With the Comics! extension you simply place all the daily comics (or other websites) that you visit daily in a bookmarks folder titled "Comics!". Then when you want to read your daily dose of comics you simply click the Comics! icon in your Chrome window to bring up all of your saved sites for simple viewing. Some pages may not display properly which is why there is the simple source button to open that page in a new tab for viewing.
